name: Elizabeth Klise von Zerneck
bio:
﻿Elizabeth Klise von Zerneck is a poet from Illinois. Her work has been published in American Life in Poetry, Crab Orchard Review, Measure, Potomac Review, Spoon River Poetry Review, Water-Stone Review, and other journals.
The recipient of an Illinois Arts Council Fellowship, Klise von Zerneck has also won a Robert Frost Foundation Poetry Award and an International Publication Prize from the Atlanta Review.
